product_name: DrybarBlowout Defense Strengthen & Extend Blowout Accelerator Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeAccelerate your blowout with Drybar Blowout Accelerator Spray. The Hyrdobond Peptide blend help to reduce breakage and strengthen hair. The Chickpea Styling Blend provides heat protection and locks in sleek, long-lasting styles.​
details: DetailsFeaturesFAST DRYINGMADE WITHOUT ALCOHOLANTI-BREAKAGEDETANGLING​HEAT PROTECTION​STYLING SUPPORT​HYDRATING​BenefitsMaintain your blowout for up to 96 Hours*​Cuts blow-dry time by 32% while locking in styles**​Makes hair up to 10X easier to detangle*​Protects against heat damage (up to 450 F) and reduces breakage up to 60%*​*When used as a system with Blowout Defense ™ Shampoo, Conditioner, and Blowout Accelerator Spray​ **vs untreated hair​Key IngredientsHydrobond Peptide repairs damaged hair and creates new bonds without build up​Chickpea Active helps retain and smooth stylesDual Hyaluronic Acid boosts hydration for softer, more manageable hairFragrance Notes: Juicy Citrus, Warm Sandalwood, and Amber​Item 2638762How To UseShake well. Spray on damp hair. Comb through and activate with heat to style. TIP: Trouble spraying? Run nozzle under warm water to clear any dried product.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. Do not store at elevated temperatures.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Isododecane , Polysorbate 20, VP/VA Copolymer, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Isoamyl Laurate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Lupine Protein, Hydroxypropylgluconamide, Hydroxypropylammonium Gluconate, Glycerin, Cicer Arietinum Seed Extract, Polyquaternium 10, PG-Hydroxyethylcellulose Cocodimonium Chloride, Squalane, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Cetrimonium Chloride *, Laurtrimonium Chloride, Sodium Bisulfite, Sodium Chloride, Lactic Acid, Benzyl Alccohol, Tartaric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Gluconate, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum / Fragrance, Geranyl Acetate, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Vanillin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake well. Spray on damp hair. Comb through and activate with heat to style. TIP: Trouble spraying? Run nozzle under warm water to clear any dried product.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. Do not store at elevated temperatures.

reviews.headline: Works well but smells like perfume
reviews.comments: Works well but smells like perfume. Was hoping it smelled like the classic Drybar scent!

reviews.headline: Doesn't smell great
reviews.comments: It really does help my blowout last longer. I have straight, fine long hair and the curl tends to not last. My blow out lasts longer with this product but it smells pretty bad. It works great if you don't mind the stink

reviews.headline: It's A Win
reviews.comments:
I styled in one fair swoop, it stayed all day, with the volume. Honestly, it worked better than five stars. 

I wish i'd have a first date as successful as this first use was, because baby, I was flipping my hair all day.

reviews.headline: Not if you want great second day hair
reviews.comments: It's okay. It leaves my hair feeling like it has product in it after I use it, but on the other hand, it does give it volume. I usually LOVE next day hair when using products I like, but this one made it feel a bit dirtier.

reviews.headline: Read the non-incentivized reviews.
reviews.comments:
I wish i had read the revirws before buying.
All of the positive reviews here are from people evo had the product gifted to them.
The reals ones are those who bought it themselves.
I cannot say strongly enough, how bad of a product this is. It made my hair so sticky, stiff and unmanageable. It didn't "extend" my blowout, in fact I had to wash 2 days sooner.
I typically love all things DryBar. This is a huge miss though.
Dont waste your money.

reviews.headline: disappointing T__T
reviews.comments: was very excited to try and was left with extremely dry, tangled hair. also caused MAJOR scalp build up that took several rounds of shampoo to get rid of. for reference i have naturally straight hair. do not recommend this product at all. especially for the price, there are better and more cost effective options out there.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this product again!
reviews.comments: I used this sparingly thankfully because I could hardly get my brush through my hair! I used my wavy brush next and that was worse! I don't even know how this has 5 stars. Doesn't matter the type of hair as it is the product! Left a sticky residue.

reviews.headline: Nope.
reviews.comments:
Lots if great reviews, but this product didnt work as expected for me. The whole blowout time was difficult…as the product dried throughout the hair, it was hard to run brush through, and i had to keel grabbing comb to detangle my hair. Lost more hair in the process, and i notice the product was also building up. Overall, I do NOT
 recommend.

reviews.headline: Product ingredients irritated my scalp
reviews.comments: Irritated my scalp

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Gifted by Drybar I absolutely love this blowout spray from dry bar. I would highly recommend to all my family and friends. This product has absolutely changed my hair and I will be purchasing again. Everything from this brand has always been a hit.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Gifted by Drybar I absolutely love this blowout spray from dry bar. I would highly recommend to all my family and friends. This product has absolutely changed my hair and I will be purchasing again. Everything from this brand has always been a hit.

reviews.headline: Blowout Defense
reviews.comments: I was so stoked to receive this product complimentary from drybar. First off the smell is great! It's easy to apply with the spray bottle. I like how it smooths over my hair while blow drying and I feel like it's shinier after I use it. I'm happy to give my hair a added boost of protection from the heat. Overall good heat protection product. I would recommend it to anyone who frequently blow dried their hair.

reviews.headline: Smells amazing
reviews.comments: I really like this blowout spray.  It has a fine mist and it smells amazing. This helps me get that look I want with soft and sleek hair. For me, this extends my style by about a day, which is worth it for me. Gifted by Drybar

reviews.headline: Styled to last
reviews.comments:
As part of my hair care routine, I like to wash it, dry it, and then style it, so I usually use heat protectants and blowout creams. When I tried the Blowout Defense gifted by drybar, it completely changed my routine and the way my hair looks. From the very first application, I noticed my hair felt softer, more manageable, and with significantly less frizz. I love that it provides heat protection, so I don't have to worry about damage from the blow dryer or about layering too many products that end up making my hair greasy faster.
When it comes to the blowout, I was impressed with how long my hairstyles lasted—especially since my hair is wavy and tends to frizz and tangle throughout the day. But with this product, my hair stayed intact, full of volume, and looked fresh and natural for much longer. Plus, it has a delicious scent that makes it even more perfect. It has definitely become a must-have in my routine.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: I love this spray! It doesn't weigh my hair down and gives me a nice bouncy texture after blow drying. I'm in awe at how healthy my hair looks! I will be repurchasing and recommending to my friends and family! Gifted by drybar.

reviews.headline: My new fav!
reviews.comments: This was Gifted by drybar and the way I love thissss I will be using this all the time this stuff made my hair feel so soft and the volume was amazing stayed all day and helped with the frizz also makes your hair feel so healthy!!

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: This spray is very lightweight. I prefer that, as heavy products tend to weigh my hair down. It provides heat protection,  which is great for my hair type, as I have to use higher heat settings to get a straighter blow out. The spray nozzle is nice too and distributes the product well. complimentary from Drybar

reviews.headline: New hair product
reviews.comments: Complimentary from drybar in exchange of my honest review. The blowiut defense is my new hair product. It helps detangles your hair, is heat protection and helps dry hair faster. Leavea my hair smooth and soft and smelling good.

reviews.headline: YES
reviews.comments: OKAYYYYY I just received this product gifted by drybar in exchange for this review and have gotten phenomenal results!!! I sprayed it all over my hair before blow drying and got VOLUME that lasted!!! Never have gotten such instant results as this one

reviews.headline: Would purchase!
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Drybar to try their new Blowouw Defense Strengthen @ Extend Accelerator. I don't do much with my hair on a daily basis, but when I decide to style it for an occassion, the curls/waves fall out within minutes. Using this product, I've noticed my styling stayed intact for a bit longer. Also, I noticed more volume as well. The spray fragrance is light and fresh.

faceoff_positive.comments:
As part of my hair care routine, I like to wash it, dry it, and then style it, so I usually use heat protectants and blowout creams. When I tried the Blowout Defense gifted by drybar, it completely changed my routine and the way my hair looks. From the very first application, I noticed my hair felt softer, more manageable, and with significantly less frizz. I love that it provides heat protection, so I don't have to worry about damage from the blow dryer or about layering too many products that end up making my hair greasy faster.
When it comes to the blowout, I was impressed with how long my hairstyles lasted—especially since my hair is wavy and tends to frizz and tangle throughout the day. But with this product, my hair stayed intact, full of volume, and looked fresh and natural for much longer. Plus, it has a delicious scent that makes it even more perfect. It has definitely become a must-have in my routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: Styled to last

faceoff_negative.comments:
I wish i had read the revirws before buying.
All of the positive reviews here are from people evo had the product gifted to them.
The reals ones are those who bought it themselves.
I cannot say strongly enough, how bad of a product this is. It made my hair so sticky, stiff and unmanageable. It didn't "extend" my blowout, in fact I had to wash 2 days sooner.
I typically love all things DryBar. This is a huge miss though.
Dont waste your money.

rollup.name: Blowout Defense Strengthen & Extend Blowout Accelerator Spray
